passive.name: PIT GRIT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) PIT GRIT
                                Sett's Attacks alternate between left and right punches. Right punches follow the left quickly and deal an additional 9 physical damage (9 + 50% bonus ).Sett gains 0.25/0.5/1/2 Health Regeneration () for each 5% missing Health.Sett will reset back to a left punch if he does not do a right punch within 2 seconds of doing a left punch. The Attack Speed of a right punch is 8 times that of a left punch.

q.name: (Q) KNUCKLE DOWN
q.description:
(Q) KNUCKLE DOWN
 9,5/8/6,5/5s  
                                
                                
                                Sett itches for a fight, gaining 35% Movement Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds.Additionally empowers the next two attacks to deal an additional 5/20/35/50 plus 1.57% (1% + 0.01/0.015/0.02/0.025% ) max health physical damage.The additional damage is capped at 100 against monsters.

w.name: (W) HAYMAKER
w.description:
(W) HAYMAKER
 16/14,5/13/11,5s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Stores 100% of damage taken as Grit, up to 305 (50% ). Grit decays quickly 4 seconds after the damage was taken.Active: Consumes all Grits, gaining 100% Grit consumed shield decaying over 3 seconds. Sett then delivers a massive punch, dealing 80/105/130/155 plus 25% (25% + 0.275% bonus ) Grit consumed true damage to enemies in the center (max 157 damage). Enemies not in the center instead take physical damage.

e.name: (E) FACEBREAKER
e.description:
(E) FACEBREAKER
 13/11.5/10/8.5s  
                                
                                
                                Smashes enemies on either side into each other, dealing 85 physical damage (50/75/100/125 + 60% ) and slowing them by 50% for 0.5 seconds. If Sett grabbed at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are stunned for 1 second.

r.name: (R) THE SHOW STOPPER
r.description:
(R) THE SHOW STOPPER
 70/65/60s  
                                
                                
                                Grab an enemy champion and suppresses them as he carries them forward, then slams them into the ground, dealing 200 (200/300/400 + 100% bonus ) plus 40/50/60% bonus Health physical damage to surrounding enemies and Slowing them by 99% for 1 second. Enemies take less damage the further they are from where Sett lands.

core_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.
